page.title: 08CALOW COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: Our school was built with a Community Centre joined onto it. It is for anyone in the village to use and there are many different activities each week.In the daytime we help to get the room ready for the play and toddler groups and for the Baby Clinic on a Wednesday afternoon.This is for the mums of Calow and Arkwright to see the Health Visitor with their babies.The centre is used most evenings for dancing classes,pottery,keepfit,Drama, Brownies,Beavers,Slimming Club,Youth Cluband for many different meetings. There are Jumble Sales,Childrens Parties,Weddings and Dances too. At lunch time some of the Senior Citizens come into school and have their lunch with us. In the centre there is a large room that can be made into two small rooms, a kitchen and a quiet reading room.
